DOC.brief_summary: From 3 interventiongroups project ClinicalTrials.gov ID NCT02034760 , namely : HRTW : Heavy Strength Training x3/week & 20g whey protein twice daily . LITW : Light Intensity Training x3-5/week & 20g whey protein twice daily . WHEY : 20g whey protein twice daily . 15 subject group recruit test 3 month intervention . Tests include muscle cross sectional area ( MRi ) , muscle biopsy ( fiber type , size , cell- capillary count ) , functional- strength measurement , plasma lipid , HbA1c . Tests compare Project ID NCT01997320 .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Strength Training Protein Ingestion Old Versus Very-old
DOC.detailed_description: In- exclusion criterion list NCT02034760 . Subjects randomize intervention describe , 15 subject three group test 12 week intervention . 15 subject include group account expect drop-out rate 20 % , 12 subject expect complete intervention . With N increase around 11 % MRi-evaluated muscle size detect powerlevel 80 % alpha 0.05 use report SD . Primary outcome muscle size ( MRi ) , secondary outcome overall body composition ( DXA ) , muscle strength , rate force development , power , 30 chair stand , 400m gait speed , grip strength . Tertiary outcome habitual activitylevel ( accelerometry ) , blood sample ( HbA1c , cholesterol , creatinine ) , blood pressure , weight , BMI , wast- hip circumference . Results compare NCT01997320 population 65+ compare population 83+ . Both study use heavy strength train regimen .
DOC.criteria: Healthy , independently live Age least 65 year Subjects dependent help/nursing etc . Chronic medical disease : Diabetes mellitus , clinical knee hip osteoarthritis , type arthritis connective tissue disorder , active cancer , renal disease , severe chronic obstructive pulmonary disease , cardiac arrhythmia know decreased leave ventricular ejection fraction , lactose gluten intolerance , chronic inflammatory bowel disease , nontreated hyper/hypothyroidism , dementia . Surgical disease : Bone , muscle , tendon joint injury compromise participation exercise regimens . Implanted magnetic device incompatible MRiscanning . Weekly alcohol consumption > 21 unit ( 1 unit equal 4g ethanol ) men > 14 woman . Medicine except acetylsalicylic acid , paracetamol , thyroid function hormone , statins dos 40mg/day combined subjective myalgia , ACEinhibitors , Angiotensin II blocker , betablockers , calciumantagonists , protonpump inhibitor , thiazide , potassiumsparing diuretic loop diuretic . > 1 hour exercise weekly , except light activity stretching/gymnastics bikeriding/walking transportation .
